params.name: start
params.description: function called at the start of the application

name: setPosition
description: set the frustum culling buffer

name: screenToWorld
description: convert screen coordinates to world coordinates

name: worldToScreen
description: convert world coordinates to screen coordinates

name: inView
description: check if a position is in the camera viewport

description: set the draw color of the drawing context

name: setAlpha
description: set the alpha value for the drawing context

name: setFont

params.name: font

name: setLineWidth

name: drawImage

name: drawText
description: draw text to the screen

name: drawRect
description: draw a rect to the screen

name: drawCircle

name: drawStroke
description: draw an outlined rect to the screen

name: load
description: load an asset

name: get
description: return the asset requested by its url

name: loadIntoMemory
description: pass the url and type to a specific loader to be loaded into memory

description: check if all the assets are done loading

name: onclose

name: encode

content:
# Crest2D
An HTML5 Game Engine designed for high performance 2D Cross Platform games

# Getting Started
Download the latest [release](https://github.com/Arcxes/Crest2D/releases)

# Building from the Source Code
to build from the source code clone the repsoitory and open the folder in a terminal

then run

`npm install` and `npm run build`
  
this will generate a folder called `build` which will contain `crest2d.js`


# Having Trouble With Our Engine?
Contact us on our [discord](https://discord.gg/w9TT8qN) server or create a new [issue](https://github.com/Arcxes/Crest2D/issues)
name: ./README.md
package.json
